name: Zombie Hitman
description:
The world is over run by zombies , but they lie dormant in day . you have 60 seconds to gather as much loot as possible then 60 seconds to defeat the zombies .

This game is an apocalyptic first person shooter , We spawn in a destroyed city over run by nature (like the last of us!) and you have 60 seconds to gather all you need  health , armor kits etc. then at 60 seconds zombie mobs are activated on random location in the maps , they can sense you and will try to eat your flesh , your goal is to kill as many zombies as possible and hold them off for as much time as possible before they devour your organs !
